p: Ascorbate is sufficient in normal situations in doses of 50-250 mg daily for maintaining plasma levels >30 Âµg/ml, however, during stress and infections the need for ascorbate intake exceeds 1,000 mg/day and its intestinal absorbtion is optimal when administration is fractionated at ~250-350 mg per dose or in extended release forms (calcium ascorbate and slow-release micronised preparations) ( 154).
